body: Just pushed a logging change to master.  Can you run master and enable verbose (-v) logging?
@mperham you should probably warn people about running anything greater than 2.0.3 in production environment....

Well eff... I am completely unable to repro this now unfortunately.  I tried running against master and didn't get the error.  I then went back to specifically 2.1.1 and again no error triggering the same bgtasks as previously.  Now still on 2.1.1 and running 100k jobs through 50 workers and not seeing anything as the log flies by...

Ok so now I'm seeing it again today...

This was running against master and had verbose logging enabled.  I don't really see much new here though.

Here's the start of the worker process on Heroku:


I made no changes other than to my Gemfile to switch back to 2.0.3 and redeployed.  I then ran the same background job (pulls in events from Eventful) and everything ran fine with no Manager#processor_died messages.  No missing constant errors either.
I'll have to revert the Celluloid change until we can figure out the problem.
